participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, Alex loves to express himself through his interests and hobbies.
participant_1.background: I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity. I wish I could live in Iceland. I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia. I have a dog. I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Taylor enjoys exploring spirituality and is passionate about her unique interests.
participant_2.background: I read a lot about paganism and spirituality and try to live my life in accordance with those beliefs. I am the leader of the french fry research department at Del Taco. I'm enjoying my time after college; jogging is a great way to stay in shape. I read ebooks on my commute and in my car, so I can enjoy my favorite books while I'm on the go. I am a dog walker.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I enjoy reading ebooks and jogging.
That sounds fun. I love to go to comic cons.
They are conventions where people dress up as their favorite comic book characters and meet the creators.
That sounds like it would be really fun!
It is. I met the creator of my favorite comic book series at one in Russia.
That must have been so cool!
It was. I was so excited to meet him.
I think I would like to go to one of those sometime.
You should! They're a lot of fun.
Do you know of any upcoming ones?
I think there's one in San Diego next month.
Oh, that's not too far from me. I might go!
